presentacion.descripcion: I like to create solid, interactive and scalable web services oriented to give interesting experiences to the user.

sobremi.descripcion:
Passionate about the creation and development of web applications, with solid knowledge of html, css, javascript and react to offer fast, resistant and optimized solutions.

Dynamism, performance and scalability are high on my radar.

html.descripcion: I can build a website from scratch, using updated semantic tags, give an SEO that optimizes the visibility of the product.

css.descripcion: To give styles with modern designs, I use Bootstrap and TailwindCss, in addition to organizing the styles with Sass, emphasizing that the products are responsive and scalable, using BEM methodologies for better code readability.

javascript.descripcion: With a focus on creating clean and scalable code, I use JavaScript to add interactivity and dynamism to my applications.
